verbose_text: Indeed, our previous report showed that aberrant phosphorylation of transforming growth factor (TGF)-beta-activating kinase 1 (TAK1) at serine 412 is critically involved in the activation of NFkappaB signaling and is associated with ovarian cancer cell aggressiveness XREF_BIBR.
evidence: phosphorylation of transforming growth factor (TGF)-beta-activating kinase 1 (TAK1) at serine 412
